price: و تنۀ نخل را به طرف خود تکان بده [تا] خرمای تازه بر تو فرو‌ریزد.
arabic: وَهُزِّيٓ إِلَيۡكِ بِجِذۡعِ ٱلنَّخۡلَةِ تُسَٰقِطۡ عَلَيۡكِ رُطَبٗا جَنِيّٗا

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wahuzzī ilayki bijidh'ʿi al-nakhlati tusāqiṭ ʿalayki ruṭaban janiyyan
